title: april 21: the texas revolution [hosted by: Tessa Violet] (with JP Saxe)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, guest host Tessa Violet talks about the Texas Revolution. After, she’s joined by musical guest JP Saxe. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
